item.description:
I have been here a few times to listen to the singers
and have had a few drinks.

There have been a few different KJ's with different
but enjoyable music styles and selections.

Randall's Restaurant
236 Platt Ave,
West Haven, CT
06516
(203) 932-1806

http://www.merchantci...

www.merchantcircle.com/business/Randalls.Restaurant.203-932-1806

http://foodio54.com/r...

foodio54.com/restaurant/West-Haven-CT/16366/Randalls-Restaurant

It is on the other side of the stores
of the CVS Store Outlet
On Rte 162/Jones Hill Road on the same side
as West Haven High School
and Ken Strong Stadium.
I have parked in front of the CVS Store.

Other Parking is in the parking lot
on the right of the Mobil Gas Station
Or in front of the CVS..

Mike B.
Organizer

group.name: Karaoke Lovers of Greater New Haven .

item.name: Randall's in West Haven
